Sentencas: Pure, single-phase, crystalline LaFeO3 powders are formed by the thermal decomposition of a metal-nitrate-tartrate gel complex at 500-700 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation and Electrical Properties of LaFeO3 Compacts Using Chemically Synthesized Powders

Sentencas: The complex is prepared by dissolving nitrates of lanthanum and iron in an aqueous solution in the presence of nitric and tartaric acids.
Titulo: Preparation and Electrical Properties of LaFeO3 Compacts Using Chemically Synthesized Powders

Sentencas: The powder can be densified at 1050 degrees C, and the resulting compacts exhibit ionic conduction above 300 degrees C with an apparent activation energy of electrical conduction of 20-30 kJ/mol.
Titulo: Preparation and Electrical Properties of LaFeO3 Compacts Using Chemically Synthesized Powders
